dcterms:description: The Blynk mobile application is used to acquire updates on real-time movement of the door, focusing on making a low-cost product with portability and practical application.
dcterms:title: Blynk mobile application

dcterms:description: The GY-521 (MPU-6050) is a micro-electromechanical sensor (MEMS) with a 3-axis accelerometer and gyroscope, used to detect angular disturbances and physical changes such as door movement.
dcterms:title: GY-521 (MPU-6050)

dcterms:description: The Arduino IDE is an open-source application software used to write programming codes for microcontrollers in the Arduino family.
dcterms:title: Arduino IDE

dcterms:description: Theft Detection System using PIR Sensor is a system that detects motion and records video, sending alerts when unauthorized movement is detected.
dcterms:title: Theft Detection System using PIR Sensor

dcterms:creator: X. Mao

dcterms:description: A smart home control system based on IoT designed to enhance home automation and security.
dcterms:title: Smart home control system based on IoT
